116 
117     def verify_token(self, token: str, token_type: str = "access") -> dict:
118         """验证JWT令牌
119 
120         Args:
121             token: JWT令牌
122             token_type: 令牌类型 (access/refresh)
123 
124         Returns:
125             dict: 解码后的令牌数据
126 
127         Raises:
128             HTTPException: 令牌无效时抛出异常
129         """
130         try:
131             payload = jwt.decode(
132                 token,
133                 self.secret_key,
134                 algorithms=[self.algorithm],
135                 audience="sys-rev-tec-users",
136                 issuer="sys-rev-tec",
137             )
138 
139             # 检查令牌类型
140             if payload.get("type") != token_type:
141                 raise HTTPException(
142                     status_code=status.HTTP_401_UNAUTHORIZED,
143                     detail=f"Invalid token type. Expected {token_type}",
144                     headers={"WWW-Authenticate": "Bearer"},
145                 )
146 
147             # 检查过期时间
148             exp = payload.get("exp")
149             if exp is None:
150                 raise HTTPException(
151                     status_code=status.HTTP_401_UNAUTHORIZED,
152                     detail="Token missing expiration",
153                     headers={"WWW-Authenticate": "Bearer"},
154                 )
155 
156             if datetime.utcnow().timestamp() > exp:
157                 raise HTTPException(
158                     status_code=status.HTTP_401_UNAUTHORIZED,
159                     detail="Token expired",
160                     headers={"WWW-Authenticate": "Bearer"},
161                 )
162 
163             return payload
164 
165         except JWTError as e:
166             raise HTTPException(
167                 status_code=status.HTTP_401_UNAUTHORIZED,
168                 detail=f"Could not validate credentials: {str(e)}",
169                 headers={"WWW-Authenticate": "Bearer"},
170             )
171
